post: I would to thank Prof. Garlaschelli for his work. He has clearly shown that even a competent professor of chemistry with all modern technologies and knowledge could not reproduce the Shroud. He failed to do what some say would have done an unknown medieval craftsman!.
title: Paper Chase: In Case You Still Thought the Garlaschelli Technique Might Have Been Used to Create the Shroud of Turin
